texts.LongWelcomeMessage: Welcome to the NewsManagement application. This is a startup project based on the ABP framework.
texts.NewsManagement:501: There is already {0} with the same name: {1}
texts.NewsManagement:504: The main category cannot be changed with subcategories.
texts.NewsManagement:505: Wrong status type selected during creation.
texts.NewsManagement:507: Draft status cannot have a publishing time.
texts.NewsManagement:508: Pending Review status cannot have a publishing time.
texts.NewsManagement:509: Archived status cannot have a publishing time.
texts.NewsManagement:510: Rejected status cannot have a publishing time.
texts.NewsManagement:511: Deleted status cannot have a publishing time.
texts.NewsManagement:512: Selected Status must have a publishing time.
texts.NewsManagement:513: Category must have the same content type.
texts.NewsManagement:514: Published Status Datetime Error: Must be now.
texts.NewsManagement:515: Scheduled Status Datetime Error: Must be in the future.
texts.NewsManagement:516: A subcategory cannot be assigned without its parent. Assigned subcategories= {categoryId}
texts.NewsManagement:517: Cannot add itself as related content.
texts.NewsManagement:519: Url must be null for Video type.
texts.NewsManagement:520: VideoId must be null for link type.
texts.NewsManagement:521: VideoId must be exist for Video type.
texts.NewsManagement:522: Url must be exist for link type.
texts.NewsManagement:524: Subcategory cannot have the same name as the parent category.
texts.NewsManagement:v401: Not in ListableContent enum type. Enum type must contain = { News = 0 , Video = 1 , Gallery = 2 }.
texts.NewsManagement:v402: Not in Video enum type. Enum type must contain = { Video = 0 , Link = 1 }.
texts.NewsManagement:v403: Only one category can be the Primary Category. Your choice = {0}
texts.NewsManagement:v404: Not in Status enum type. Enum type must contain = { Draft = 0 , Pending Review = 1 , Archived = 2 , Published = 3 , Scheduled = 4 , Deleted = 5 , Rejected = 6 }.
